value.title: Difference between duplicate and reference a query in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I am going to show you the difference between duplicate and reference a query in Power Query and what you can use them for. value.title: How to do Pagination on a REST API in Power Query (Part 1)

value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI.
